<p><strong><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span>Paediatric Appointment Facilitator</span></span></strong></p>
<p><br /><span> An exciting opportunity has arisen to join the Paediatric Appointments and Reception Team as a Paediatric Appointment Facilitator. This is a 30 hour role based in the Children’s Units at Ashford and St Peter’s Hospitals. <br /> <br /> We are looking for a friendly, motivated and highly organised person with good I.T. skills and a flexible approach to join the team. Good communication skills are essential for dealing </span><span>with a wide range of health care professionals as well as patients and their relatives. </span><span>Previous NHS administrative experience is desirable but not essential although sound overall administration skills are required along with a positive attitude. <br /> <br /> For an informal discussion please contact Catherine McCandless, Reception Supervisor on 01932 722545 or Sarah Beadle, Clinical Office Team Leader on 01932 722397.</span></p>
